title: Cyano-functionalized pyrazine: an electron-deficient unit as a solid additive enables binary organic solar cells with 19.67% efficiency
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4EE00764F, Paper
Lijun Tu, Hao Wang, Weixu Duan, Ruijie Ma, Tao Jia, Top Archie Dela Pe√±a, Yongmin Luo, Jiaying Wu, Mingjie Li, Xiaomin Xia, Siqi Wu, Kai Chen, Yue Wu, Yulin Huang, Kun Yang, Gang Li, Yongqiang Shi
A strong electron-deficient unit CNPz as a solid additive was developed in PTQ10/m-BTP-PhC6 binary organic solar cells. A high PCE of 19.67% was achieved with a significant increase of the JSC and FF (81.8%).
To cite this article before page numbers are assigned, use the DOI form of citation above.
